description: Complete system overview detailing the sales intelligence platform architecture, component interaction, and integration patterns between CRM, email, and AI systems
Detailed documentation of the hierarchical data models including organization structure, user contexts, CRM integrations, and their relationships and inheritance patterns
Comprehensive documentation of AI algorithms for profile analysis, email generation, and context-aware sales intelligence, including prompt engineering and context assembly logic
Detailed documentation of data flows between LinkedIn profile analysis, CRM systems, email providers, and AI components, including synchronization patterns and error handling
Documentation of the multi-level permission system, including organization hierarchy, content sharing rules, and context inheritance mechanisms
